title: Cramer points out stocks to watch as China's economy slows down
description: In the wake of China's weaker-than-expected economic data, Jim Cramer told investors which stocks to watch.

title: Young people are at risk of harsh respiratory problems after 30 days of e-cigarette use, study says
description: Researchers urged drug regulators to consider the study findings and work to minimize the negative impact of electronic cigarette use on young people.

title: Apple reverses course, moves iPhone 'end call' button back to middle in latest beta
description: The move reverses a change that Apple had been considering over the summer, as CNBC reported last week.

title: Jeffrey Epstein referred Obama White House counsel to JPMorgan as potential customer
description: Jeffrey Epstein, a former friend of Donald Trump and Bill Clinton, killed himself a month after being arrested on child sex trafficking charges in 2019.

title: Trump stiffed his alleged co-conspirators, whose false claims brought in $250 million
description: Some of former president Donald Trump's alleged co-conspirators were never paid for their work for his campaign, despite a $250 million windfall.

title: Cava shares surge as Mediterranean restaurant chain swings to a profit in first report since IPO
description: Cava net sales soared 62% to $172.9 million, fueled by new restaurant openings.

title: Disney accused of withholding hundreds of millions of dollars from 'Avatar' sequel financier
description: Disney has been accused of withholding profits from TSG Entertainment, a long-time financing partner of its 20th Century Fox studio.

title: A.I. startup founder charged with defrauding investors, manipulating documents
description: Michael Brackett defrauded an investor and manipulated financials to raise money for his artificial intelligence startup, Manhattan prosecutors alleged.

title: Hindenburg Research targets $4.6 billion Kazakh brokerage for allegedly helping Russian oligarchs evade sanctions
description: Kazakhstan's Freedom Holding is helping Russian oligarchs evade sanctions and launder funds, according to a report from short seller Hindenburg Research.

title: Inside the largest-ever A.I. chatbot hack fest, where hackers tried to outsmart OpenAI, Microsoft, Google
description: Last weekend, the White House challenged thousands of hackers to try to outsmart top generative AI models from OpenAI, Google, Microsoft, Meta, Nvidia and more.

title: I bought an abandoned lighthouse for $71,000 and spent over $300,000 making it a home—take a look inside
description: Sheila Consaul bought the Fairport Harbor West Lighthouse in Ohio in 2011 and has since spent over $300,000 renovating it into her summer home.

title: Your iPhone battery life is probably getting worse. Here's what to do.
description: There's an easy way to check to see how much capacity your iPhone battery has lost.

title: Poseidon Dynamic Cannabis ETF to close as investors lose interest in marijuana industry
description: The Poseidon Dynamic Cannabis ETF is closing up shop and cashing out to its shareholders nearly two years after it launched and following a sharp drop.

title: Check out this $1,000 TV that hides in its own suitcase
description: LG is taking preorders for the TV, called the StanbyME Go. It costs $1,000 and ships starting Aug. 28.

title: Regional banks slide after Fed's Kashkari advocates 'significantly further' capital regulation
description: The Minneapolis Fed president favors getting tougher on regional banks, following a crisis earlier this year that he said may not be over.

title: Offshore wind turbine catches fire off east coast of Britain
description: The alarm was raised at approximately 10:50 a.m. local time.

title: Fitch warns it may be forced to downgrade dozens of banks, including JPMorgan Chase
description: Fitch Ratings warned that U.S. banks have inched closer to sweeping rating downgrades on dozens of lenders, including JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America.

title: Singapore among world's first to agree stablecoin crypto regulation
description: The stablecoin market is valued at around $125 billion with two tokens — Tether's USDT and Circle's USDC — dominating with around 90% share.

title: Russian central bank jacks up interest rates to 12% at emergency meeting after ruble plunge
description: Russia's central bank on Tuesday hiked interest rates by 350 points to 12% at an emergency meeting, as Moscow looks to halt a rapid depreciation of the ruble currency.

title: As the new Eris Covid variant spreads across the world, here’s what we know so far
description: EG.5 or "Eris," now the dominant variant in the United States, is currently thought to have the same risk level as existing variants.

title: China surprises with rate cuts as economy grapples with 'confidence crisis'
description: China's central bank unexpectedly cut rates on Tuesday, as policymakers continued to step up support for its struggling economy.

title: Tesla launches lower range Model X and Model S that are $10,000 cheaper
description: The Tesla Model X Standard Range starts at $88,490 versus $98,490 for the Model X. The Model S Standard Range starts at $78,490 versus $88,490 for the Model S.

title: CNBC Daily Open: There is an alternative
description: Technology stocks and chipmakers helped major U.S. indexes regain their footing after ending last week in the red. Bonds, too, seem to be making a comeback.

title: VinFast CEO says it's a 'big milestone' for the Vietnamese EV maker to be listed in the U.S.
description: Vietnamese EV maker VinFast is expected to list on the Nasdaq Tuesday morning in New York.

title: China is on course to overtake Japan and become the world's No.1 car exporter
description: China is on course to overtake Japan to become the world's number one car exporter by the end of the year, according to Moody's Analytics.

title: DeSantis says he would ban TikTok because of China threat
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis told CNBC that he would ban TikTok because the app is controlled by China.

title: China's economic data misses expectations, drops youth unemployment number from report
description: The National Bureau of Statistics report also did not include the unemployment figure for young people, which has soared to record highs in recent months.

title: Japan's economy grew 6% in the second quarter, far more than expected
description: Economist surveyed by Reuters had expected the world's third-largest economy to post 3.1% growth in the April-June quarter.

title: Trump Georgia grand jury begins voting on possible indictment
description: Donald Trump is under investigation by Fulton County DA Fani Willis for trying to get Georgia officials to overturn his loss to President Joe Biden.
